caption: Figure 2: The distribution of instruction types of the synthetic data.
description: The pie chart Figure 2 shows the distribution of instruction types in the synthetic data, with Relation Reasoning having the largest proportion.

caption: Figure 3: The change of model performance with training data size.
description: The chart displays the model performance of Aquila-VL-2B, InternVL2-2B, and Qwen2VL-2B across various training data sizes, highlighting the impact of data scaling on model performance.
